alert.note: Alert for Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 6:35PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Denton and northern Tarrant Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 635 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Worth, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Flower Mound, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Haltom City, Keller, Hurst, Southlake, Watauga, Colleyville, Benbrook, Saginaw, White Settlement, Azle, Trophy Club, Richland Hills, River Oaks, Sansom Park and Lake Worth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
